comment._content: The father was: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Archduke_Franz_Salvator_of_Austria The marriage of the Archduchess Elizabeth Franziska, daughter of the Archduke Francis Salvator, to Count George von Waldburg at Vienna to-day added another romance to the many in the records of the house of Hapsburg. Count Waldburg is a young officer who has neither property nor prospects. And I gave her her own entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Archduchess_Elisabeth_Franziska_of_...
